dcterms:description: A toy environment designed to highlight limitations with restricting the functional form of Q(s, a) to be quadratic or concave. The environment has a single state and a function of two radial basis functions centered at specific action values.
dcterms:title: Bimodal Environment

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An environment where the goal is to swing the pendulum up to the top and stay upright, with spending the least amount of energy.
dcterms:title: Pendulum

dcterms:creator: E. Todorov
T. Erez
Y. Tassa
dcterms:description: An environment where the goal is to move forward as much as possible with a cheetah-like figure.
dcterms:title: HalfCheetah

dcterms:creator: E. Todorov
T. Erez
Y. Tassa
dcterms:description: An environment where the goal is to move forward as much as possible with a monoped figure.
dcterms:title: Hopper

dcterms:creator: E. Todorov
T. Erez
Y. Tassa
dcterms:description: An environment where the goal is to move forward as much as possible with an ant-like quadroped.
dcterms:title: Ant
